title: Global sunroof companies look to ride the giant India wave
description: Car sunroofs are becoming popular in India. Global manufacturers are investing heavily with local partners to meet the increasing demand. The market for sunroofs is growing rapidly, leading to expansions and new deals. Companies are setting up new plants and increasing their production capabilities to cater to this trend.
